data.eml:eml: A new species of Phrynobatrachus (Amphibia: Anura: Phrynobatrachidae) from north-western Guinea, West Africa

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hillers, Annika, Zimkus, Breda, Rödel, Mark-Oliver (2008): A new species of Phrynobatrachus (Amphibia: Anura: Phrynobatrachidae) from north-western Guinea, West Africa. Zootaxa 1815: 43-50, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.274365
